ChineseHoroscopePage.calculationNote: Note: This calculation is based on the Gregorian year. The Chinese New Year varies, so if you were born in January or February, your sign might differ.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rabbit: Gentle, quiet, elegant, and alert; quick and skillful.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dragon: Confident, intelligent, enthusiastic, and a natural leader.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Horse: Lively, active, energetic, and loves to be in a crowd.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Goat: Mild-mannered, shy, stable, sympathetic, and amicable.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Rooste: Observant, hardworking, resourceful, courageous, and talented.
ChineseHoroscopePage.descriptions.Dog: Loyal, honest, amiable, kind, cautious, and prudent.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rat.interpretatio: Rats are known for their charm and intelligence. They are natural opportunists with an incredible ability to adapt to new situations. Their curiosity is boundless, and they are always looking for ways to improve their lives and the lives of those around them. While they can be a bit thrifty, they are extremely loyal to their friends and family. Their quick mind and sociable nature make them excellent strategists and problem-solvers.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Ox.interpretation: The Ox symbolizes strength, diligence, and reliability. They are tireless workers who believe in the power of patience and perseverance. Their methodical approach to life allows them to build solid and lasting foundations. Although they can be stubborn and resistant to change, their loyalty and sense of duty are unwavering. An Ox is a friend and partner you can always count on.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Tiger.interpretat: The Tiger is the epitome of courage, charisma, and confidence. They are natural leaders with a magnetic energy that draws others in. They live life with passion and intensity, and they are not afraid to take risks to achieve their goals. Their unpredictable nature makes them exciting, but they can also be impulsive and hot-tempered. A Tiger will always stand up for what they believe is right and will fiercely protect their loved ones.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rabbit.interpreta: The Rabbit is a symbol of peace, elegance, and sensitivity. They are gentle souls who crave a harmonious environment and avoid conflict at all costs. Their diplomatic nature and good taste make them excellent hosts and friends. Although they may seem timid, they are extremely vigilant and astute, capable of navigating danger with grace. Their greatest strength is their ability to create beauty and tranquility around them.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Dragon.interpreta: The Dragon is the most powerful and auspicious sign of the Chinese zodiac. They are charismatic visionaries, full of energy, ambition, and an innate desire to lead. Their self-confidence is immense, and they are not afraid of challenges. They can sometimes seem arrogant, but their heart is generous, and they are always willing to help others. A Dragon is destined to leave a mark on the world.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Snake.interpretat: The Snake is wise, enigmatic, and deeply intuitive. They possess a sharp mind and a calmness that hides great inner strength. They are excellent strategists who prefer to work in silence, analyzing situations from all angles before making a move. While they can be secretive and distrustful, they are extremely loyal and possessive of the people they love. Their wisdom and magnetic charm are their greatest gifts.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Horse.interpretat: The Horse is a free spirit, full of energy, optimism, and an insatiable love for adventure. They are extremely sociable and love to be at the center of the action. Their independence is their most prized possession, and they hate feeling tied down or restricted. Although their impulsive nature can lead them to make hasty decisions, their enthusiasm is contagious, and their ability to bounce back from setbacks is admirable.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Goat.interpretati: The Goat is the artist of the Chinese zodiac, a kind, creative, and compassionate soul. They are dreamers who value beauty, peace, and harmony above all else. Their sensitive nature makes them very empathetic, but also prone to melancholy and indecisiveness. They need a stable and supportive environment for their creativity to flourish. A Goat is a loyal friend and a sympathetic partner.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Monkey.interpreta: The Monkey is the mischievous genius of the zodiac. They are incredibly intelligent, witty, and curious, with an unparalleled ability to solve complex problems in creative ways. Their sense of humor and love of fun make them the life of any social gathering. The challenge for the Monkey is to channel their mental energy so they don't get bored or become too manipulative. Their greatest asset is their ability to innovate and adapt to any situation.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Rooster.interpret: The Rooster is the perfectionist of the zodiac, observant, hardworking, and with a great sense of duty. They are extremely organized and have a keen eye for detail, making them excellent planners. Their honesty is direct and sometimes brutal, as they believe in telling the truth to improve things. Although they can seem arrogant, they are deeply loyal and always willing to work hard for the good of their family and community.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Dog.interpretatio: The Dog is the loyal and honest guardian of the zodiac. Their sense of justice and their loyalty are absolute. They are friends and partners who can be trusted blindly, always ready to defend the weak and fight for what is right. Their nature can sometimes be pessimistic or anxious, as they tend to worry about others. A Dog is the most faithful companion one could wish for.
ChineseHoroscopeDetail.Pig.interpretatio: The Pig is a symbol of generosity, honesty, and good fortune. They are kind-hearted souls who enjoy the simple pleasures of life and work hard to provide for their loved ones. Their trusting nature and lack of pretense endear them to everyone. Although they can sometimes be a bit naive, their heart is pure, and their optimism is unwavering. A Pig in your life is a constant source of joy and unconditional support.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content:
Welcome to AstroVibes. Your privacy is critically important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our application.

We may update this policy at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated policy, and we encourage you to review it periodically.

informationWeCollect.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content:
**Personal Data:** We collect information you voluntarily provide, such as name, email, and birth data (date, time, location), to create personalized astrological readings.

**User-Generated Content:** We collect information you post in community features, including comments and reactions.

**Usage Data:** We automatically collect information about your interactions with the app, such as feature usage and crash reports, to improve our services.

howWeUseInformation.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUseInformation.content:
Your information is used to:
- Personalize and manage your account.
- Provide accurate astrological reports (horoscopes, natal charts).
- Enable community features.
- Analyze usage to enhance our app.
- Serve relevant advertising through third-party services like Google AdSense.

dataSharing.title: 4. Third-Party Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We share your information with third-party vendors who help us provide and improve our services, such as:
- **Firebase (Google):** For authentication, database management, and analytics.
- **Google AdSense:** To serve personalized advertisements.

These parties are required to protect your data in accordance with their own privacy policies. We do not sell your personal information.

advertising.title: 5. Advertising
advertising.content: We use Google AdSense to serve ads. Google uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our or other websites. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google's Ad Settings. For more information, please review Google's Privacy Policy.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access. However, no security measure is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your data.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights and Control
yourRights.content: You have the right to access and update your personal information. You can review and change your birth information and profile details at any time in the app's Profile and Onboarding sections. To delete your account or for other privacy-related requests, please contact us at the email below.

childrensPrivacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.content: Our services are not directed to anyone under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children. If we become aware that a child has provided us with personal data, we will delete it promptly.

changesToPolicy.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us at: jordi.jordi.jordi9@gmail.com

Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.kinCalculatorDescript: The Mayan Kin is a unit of time and energy in the Tzolkin (sacred Mayan calendar). It represents your personal galactic signature, combining the energy of a Solar Seal and a Galactic Tone, offering insights into your purpose and life path.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.selectDatePrompt: Select your birth date to discover your Mayan Kin.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.errorCalculatingKin: Error calculating your Kin. Please check the date and try again.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.showCalculationExplan: See how your Kin is calculated
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep1: Base Date: July 26, 1987 (Kin 1: 1 Imix - Magnetic Dragon) is used as the starting point in the Dreamspell count.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep2: Days Elapsed: We calculate the total number of days between the base date and your birth date.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep3: Kin Number: Using modulo 260 (total kins in the Tzolkin), we get your Kin number (1-260). Simplified formula: Kin = ((DaysSinceBase + BaseKin - 1) % 260 + 260) % 260 + 1.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep4: Solar Seal (Nahual): Derived from the Kin number using modulo 20: (Kin - 1) % 20.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainStep5: Galactic Tone: Derived from the Kin number using modulo 13: (Kin - 1) % 13.
Admin.MayanHoroscopePage.calcExplainNote: This is a modern interpretation (Dreamspell) of the Mayan Tzolkin. Other traditional counts exist.

Admin.MayanSign.Imix.interpretation: Imix represents birth, primal energy, and trust in the universe's provision. It is the cosmic womb, the origin of all things. Those born under this seal are natural initiators, providers, and protectors with a strong survival instinct. Their energy is raw, potent, and often manifests as a torrent of ideas and potential. They are often seen as the pillars of their families and communities, offering nourishment and security. Their main challenge is to learn to trust the abundant flow of life, letting go of control and overcoming fears of scarcity or abandonment. The energy of Imix invites you to connect with the source of all creation, to honor your basic needs, and to have faith that the universe will always provide. It is a call to embrace your creative power and to birth new beginnings.
Admin.MayanSign.Ik.interpretation: Ik is the vital breath, the invisible spirit that animates all of creation. It is the energy of communication, truth, and inspiration. Ik people are natural communicators, quick thinkers with an agile mind who often have a gift for language, writing, and the spoken word. They are versatile, adaptable, and can change direction as easily as the wind, which makes them excellent at multitasking and problem-solving. Their main challenge is to learn to focus their mental energy and to stay grounded, as their tendency to scatter can prevent them from materializing their multiple ideas. The energy of Ik encourages you to speak your truth with clarity, to breathe deeply to connect with your center, and to allow the spirit of life to move through you, carrying and bringing important messages.
Admin.MayanSign.Akbal.interpretation: Akbal is the seal of the night, the sanctuary of the home, and the vast world of dreams. It represents the introspection profound, the intuition and the courageous journey into the darkness of the subconscious to find the light of inner truth. Those under the Akbal seal are often deep, mysterious, and possess a rich inner life. They are comfortable in silence and stillness, where they can explore their mental labyrinths. Their main challenge is not to get lost in their own thoughts or fears, learning to balance introspection with action in the outer world. Their task is to bring the treasures of their inner world out into the light of day. Akbal invites you to explore your dreams, to confront your shadows, and to find the security and abundance that reside within you, in your own inner temple.
Admin.MayanSign.Kan.interpretation: Kan symbolizes the seed, the immense potential contained in a tiny point, and the explosive energy of growth. It represents the opportunity to flourish, to manifest talents, and to achieve self-development. Kan people are dynamic, energetic, full of ideas, and possess an innate desire to evolve and expand. They are natural leaders who inspire others to reach their full potential, acting as catalysts for change. Their main challenge lies in cultivating patience, understanding that all growth has its own rhythm. They must learn to trust the natural process without forcing results, avoiding the frustration of non-instant gratification. Kan encourages you to plant the seeds of your intentions with clear focus, to care for them with awareness and dedication, and to trust that, at the right time, you will reap the fruits of your labor.
Admin.MayanSign.Chicchan.interpretation: Chicchan is the serpent, the symbol of life force (Kundalini), pure instinct, and the deep connection with the intelligence of the physical body. It is the raw energy of survival, passion, sexuality, and the primal wisdom that resides in our DNA. Chicchan people are charismatic, intense, and possess a magnetic presence that does not go unnoticed. Guided by their instincts, they have an incredible capacity for transformation and regeneration, shedding their skin to be reborn stronger. Their challenge is to learn to balance their powerful instinctual energy with the wisdom of the heart, avoiding falling into purely primal reactions. Chicchan invites you to honor your body as a sacred temple, to listen attentively to your instincts, to embrace your passion for life, and to use your vital energy to heal and transform.
Admin.MayanSign.Cimi.interpretation: Cimi is the seal of death and a transformation. It represents the ability to let go of the old to make way for the new, surrender, and the bridge between worlds. Far from being a negative sign, Cimi is a sign of great opportunity for renewal. Those born under the Cimi seal are often wise, understanding, and have a unique perspective on the cycles of life. They understand that every ending is a new beginning. Their challenge is not to fear change and to learn to surrender to the natural flow of life without resistance. Cimi encourages you to forgive, to release what no longer serves you, to shed old identities, and to embrace the liberation of transformation as an essential part of evolution.
Admin.MayanSign.Manik.interpretation: Manik is the hand, symbolizing healing, accomplishment, and knowledge. It is the energy of concrete action, of tools, and of finalization. Manik people are often skilled, practical, and have a natural gift for healing, whether it be physical, emotional, or spiritual. They are problem-solvers who enjoy rolling up their sleeves and getting things done. They are generous and find satisfaction in helping others. Their challenge is to learn to receive as much as they give and to avoid perfectionism. Manik invites you to use your hands to create, to heal, to share what you have learned with others, and to complete what you have started, turning your visions into tangible reality.
Admin.MayanSign.Lamat.interpretation: Lamat is the star, representing beauty, harmony, and elegance. It is the energy that connects us to the harmony of the cosmos and reminds us of our own inner light. Lamat people are often artistic, sociable, and have a deep sense of aesthetics. They seek to create harmony and beauty in their environment and in their relationships. They have a natural brilliance that attracts others. Their challenge is not to get lost in superficiality or the need for external validation, and to learn to find beauty in imperfection as well. Lamat invites you to let your own light shine, to embrace creativity as a form of service, and to find harmony in all things.
Admin.MayanSign.Muluc.interpretation: Muluc is the water, representing primordial emotions, purification, and the flow of life. It is the seal of the moon and awakened consciousness. Muluc people are highly intuitive, empathetic, and emotionally deep. They are like antennas, picking up on the feelings of those around them. They have a strong connection to the divine feminine and the cycles of nature. Their challenge is to learn to navigate their own emotional currents without drowning in them or in the emotions of others. Muluc invites you to honor your emotions, to purify your heart of old wounds, to trust your intuition, and to flow with life instead of fighting against it.
Admin.MayanSign.Oc.interpretation: Oc is the dog, the symbol of loyalty, unconditional love, and relationships. It is the energy of the heart, of friendship, of family, and of guidance. Oc people are loyal companions, protective, trustworthy, and deeply committed to their loved ones. They deeply value their relationships and often act as guides or guardians for others, offering emotional support and a safe harbor. Their challenge is to overcome the fear of abandonment or betrayal and to learn to love themselves as much as they love others. Oc invites you to explore the themes of love, loyalty, trust, and companionship in your life, and to learn that true loyalty begins with yourself.
Admin.MayanSign.Chuen.interpretation: Chuen is the monkey, the master of play, magic, and divine illusion. It is the energy of creativity, spontaneity, and humor. Chuen people are often artists, performers, and pranksters with a nimble mind and a playful spirit. They have the ability to see life as a grand game, to invent new things, and to find joy in the present moment. They teach us not to take ourselves too seriously. Their challenge is not to get caught up in the superficiality of their own illusions and to use their immense intelligence constructively. Chuen invites you to play, to be creative, to find the magic in the everyday, and to live life with a light heart.
Admin.MayanSign.Eb.interpretation: Eb is the road, representing the journey of life, free will, and abundance. It is the energy that guides us and reminds us that we are the pilots of our own destiny. Eb people are often generous, hardworking, and have a deep connection with nature and Mother Earth. They enjoy exploring, whether physically or intellectually, and are constantly looking for ways to improve themselves and their community. Their challenge is to choose their path wisely and not to get lost in the options or the expectations of others. Eb invites you to walk your path with purpose and gratitude, recognizing that the journey itself is the destination.
Admin.MayanSign.Ben.interpretation: Ben is the reed, the hollow channel that serves as a pillar that connects heaven and earth. It is the seal of growth, of family authority, and of time-space. Ben people are often natural leaders, strong, determined, and with a deep sense of their convictions and of their values. They are explorers of consciousness, always looking to expand their horizons and to bridge different realities. Their challenge is to remain flexible and not to become too rigid or dogmatic in their beliefs. Ben invites you to stand firm in your truth while remaining open to new perspectives, thus becoming a channel for celestial wisdom on Earth.
Admin.MayanSign.Ix.interpretation: Ix is the jaguar, the shaman and magician who walks between worlds. It represents magic, night vision, intuition, and the power of the heart. Ix people are often mysterious, sensitive, have a strong connection to nature and the spiritual world. They are the guardians of ancient wisdom and sacred sites. Their energy is that of the seer, who perceives the invisible. Their challenge is to integrate their power responsibly, to honor their personal space, and to trust in their inner vision. Ix invites you to connect with your inner magic, to trust your intuition, to sharpen your senses, and to walk the world with an open and courageous heart.
Admin.MayanSign.Men.interpretation: Men is the eagle, representing the higher vision, the collective mind, and planetary consciousness. It is the energy that allows us to see the big picture and to rise above mundane problems and dramas. Men people are often visionaries, independent thinkers, and have a sharp, analytical mind that allows them to see patterns and solutions that others miss. Their challenge is to learn to come back down to earth and to connect with others on an emotional level, and not just an intellectual one, to avoid becoming too detached or critical. Men invites you to expand your vision, to believe in your highest dreams, and to share your unique perspective for the benefit of all.
Admin.MayanSign.Cib.interpretation: Cib is the vulture or owl, the guardian of ancient wisdom and cosmic memory. It represents the ability to receive and channel divine guidance and to clear old karmic patterns. Cib people are often serious, wise, conscientious, and have a deep connection to the past and to karma. They are excellent counselors, capable of looking at complex problems with a higher perspective. Their challenge is to forgive themselves and others, releasing old burdens to be able to receive new wisdom. Cib invites you to quiet your mind, to listen to the soft voice of your inner consciousness, and to honor the wisdom of your ancestors.
Admin.MayanSign.Caban.interpretation: Caban is the earth, the energy of synchronicity, navigation, and evolution. It is the force that aligns us with the pulse of the Earth and guides us on our path, reminding us that we are never alone. Caban people are often progressive, mentally active, and have a great sense of direction. They are the ones who set the pace of change and are often at the forefront of new ideas. Their challenge is to stay grounded and not to get carried away by mental overload or a constant need for stimulation. Caban invites you to pay attention to the signs and synchronicities that life presents to you, as they are the language with which the universe speaks to you.
Admin.MayanSign.Etznab.interpretation: Etznab is the flint, the mirror that reflects the truth without distortion. It is the energy of clarity, discernment, and the ability to cut away what is not essential, the illusions, and the self-deceptions. Etznab people are often brave, direct, and have a mind as sharp as a knife. They seek the unadorned truth, even if it is uncomfortable. Their challenge is to use their power of discernment with compassion, and not with judgment, as their words can hurt. Etznab invites you to look at yourself in the mirror of honest self-assessment and to cut away any illusions that prevent you from seeing reality, and to live your truth with integrity.
Admin.MayanSign.Cauac.interpretation: Cauac is the storm, the energy of purification, profound transformation, and regeneration. It represents the rain that cleanses the old, the lightning that dissolves structures, and the energy that nurtures new life. Cauac people are often catalysts for change, youthful, and full of untamable energy. They bring an intensity that can be both destructive and incredibly healing. Their challenge is to learn to channel their intense energy constructively, rather than being consumed by it. Cauac invites you to embrace change, to allow for emotional release, and to be reborn from your own ashes, strengthened and renewed.
Admin.MayanSign.Ahau.interpretation: Ahau is the sun, the lord, the energy of enlightenment, unconditional love, and union with the divine source. It is the final seal, representing mastery and fulfillment. Ahau people are often artists, leaders, and dreamers who radiate a special light and warmth. Their purpose is to embody love, beauty, and consciousness on Earth. They are here to realize their full potential. Their challenge is to overcome their own ego in order to be a true channel of light, and not to get caught up in false pride or the need for recognition. Ahau invites you to connect with your inner sovereignty, to love unconditionally, and to celebrate the beauty of all creation.

Admin.GalacticTone.Magnetic.interpretation: The Magnetic Tone is the Alpha, the starting point of all creation within the 13-day cycle. It functions as a powerful cosmic magnet, a center of gravity that attracts all the energies, resources, people, and circumstances necessary for the manifestation of a new purpose. It represents primordial unity, inviting you to gather all the scattered fragments of your will and focus them into a single, powerful intention. It is not a day for external action, but for internal attraction and clear definition. The key question is: 'What is my purpose?'. Today, the universe asks you to sit in silence, identify your deepest goal for this Trecena, and declare it with conviction. In doing so, you establish a vibrational frequency that will begin to attract everything you need for your journey.
Admin.GalacticTone.Lunar.interpretation: The Lunar Tone is that of polarity. Once you have defined your purpose with the Magnetic Tone, the Lunar Tone presents you with the great challenge: the obstacle you must overcome, the duality you must integrate. It functions as a mirror, reflecting the opposing forces at play: light and shadow, support and resistance. It is not a negative energy; on the contrary, it is essential for growth. Without a challenge, there is no movement. Stability is found by learning to walk the tightrope between two poles. Today, the universe asks you: 'What is my challenge?'. Identify the obstacles, doubts, and relationships that test your purpose. By recognizing them not as enemies, but as masters of balance, you gain the strength and wisdom needed to stabilize your path.
Admin.GalacticTone.Electric.interpretation: The Electric Tone is the first spark of action, the energy that activates and unites. After identifying the purpose (Tone 1) and the challenge (Tone 2), Tone 3 impels you to create the link between them. It is the current that flows, weaving a network of connections and setting your resources in motion. Its keyword is 'Service,' because it asks you how your actions can serve not only your purpose, but also a greater good. It is the time to build bridges, to communicate, to activate your support network, and to put your talents at the service of your goal. Today, the question is: 'How can I best serve?'. Look for opportunities to collaborate, to share your gifts, and to create synergies. Today's action is dynamic and connective.
Admin.GalacticTone.SelfExisting.interpretation: The Self-Existing Tone brings the energy of form and definition. Once the energy has been activated, this tone gives it a structure, a container. It is the architect of the cycle, the one who lays the foundations, measures the parameters, and defines the limits. It asks you to think about the most effective form for your action. What plan, what strategy, what structure do you need so that your purpose does not disperse? It is the time to create order, to establish a framework, and to give a tangible form to your ideas. Today, the question is: 'What is the form of my action?'. Define your plans, organize your steps, and create a clear map. The stability of your project depends on the foundations you build today.
Admin.GalacticTone.Overtone.interpretation: The Overtone Tone is the radiant center of power. Once you have a structure, this tone asks you to gather all your resources and put them in command. It is the moment to take control, to empower yourself, and to radiate your authority from the center of your being. It is not about power over others, but the power to manage your own skills and talents with mastery. It is the command tower from which you direct your project. Today, the question is: 'How can I empower myself?'. Gather your tools, recognize your strengths, and take the reins. Radiate confidence and certainty in your purpose. It is a day to shine and lead from your core.
Admin.GalacticTone.Rhythmic.interpretation: The Rhythmic Tone introduces the concept of balance in motion. After taking power, this tone teaches you to apply it with rhythm and fluidity. It is about organizing your actions so they flow organically and balanced, adapting to challenges without losing your center. It's like a dance: it requires structure, but also grace and responsiveness. The keyword is 'Equality,' as it asks you to balance all aspects of your life: work and rest, giving and receiving, action and introspection. Today, the question is: 'How do I organize for equality?'. Find your natural rhythm, don't force things. Organize your day in a way that nurtures you and keeps you in a constant, harmonious flow.
Admin.GalacticTone.Resonant.interpretation: The Resonant Tone is the midpoint of the Trecena, the central channel that connects you directly to the source of inspiration. It is the energy of attunement, like adjusting a radio antenna to receive a clear signal. This tone invites you to stop, to silence the external noise, and to listen to the wisdom emanating from within you and from the universe. It is not a day of action, but of reception. Today, the question is: 'How can I attune my service to others?'. Meditate, walk in nature, pay attention to synchronicities. Allow yourself to be a channel for divine inspiration, letting energy flow through you and guide you to the next steps of your purpose.
Admin.GalacticTone.Galactic.interpretation: The Galactic Tone is that of integrity, the one that asks if you truly 'walk your talk'. After receiving inspiration (Tone 7), this tone challenges you to live in harmony with that truth. It is an examination of coherence: are your actions, words, and thoughts aligned with your deepest beliefs? It invites you to model your truth, to be a living example of your values. Today, the question is: 'Do I live what I believe?'. Observe your life and look for any area where you are not being authentic. It is a day to adjust your behavior and ensure that every step you take is in perfect harmony with your ethical and spiritual code.
Admin.GalacticTone.Solar.interpretation: The Solar Tone is the pulse of intention, the energy that realizes and materializes. With your integrity confirmed, now is the time to act with a clear and focused intention. It is like the sunbeam that pierces the clouds to touch a specific point on Earth. This tone gives you the strength to take the decisive steps that will bring your purpose to manifestation. Today, the question is: 'How do I achieve my purpose?'. It's not about just any action, but the precise and deliberate action that brings you closer to your goal. Identify the next key step and execute it with all your will and conviction.
Admin.GalacticTone.Planetary.interpretation: The Planetary Tone is that of manifestation and perfection. This is where your intentions and actions become visible in the physical world. It is the time of harvest, of seeing the tangible result of your work. But it's not just about producing, but about perfecting. This tone invites you to observe what you have created and make the final adjustments so that it aligns perfectly with your original vision. Today, the question is: 'How do I perfect what I do?'. Observe your creation, whether it's a project, a relationship, or an internal change, and polish the details. It is the time to manifest excellence.
Admin.GalacticTone.Spectral.interpretation: The Spectral Tone brings the energy of release and dissolution. After manifesting (Tone 10), this tone asks you to let go of everything that is not essential, all the excess emotional, mental, or physical baggage you have accumulated in the process. It is an energy of catharsis, of deep cleansing. Like a snake shedding its skin, you must free yourself from old structures and beliefs in order to continue growing. Today, the question is: 'How do I release and let go?'. Identify what weighs you down, what limits you, and make a conscious act of letting it go, creating space and lightness for the next cycle.
Admin.GalacticTone.Crystal.interpretation: The Crystal Tone is that of cooperation and community. Once you have freed yourself from the unnecessary, you are ready to share your wisdom and achievements with others. This tone represents the 'round table,' where all points of view are valid and collaboration creates a more complex and stable structure than you could create alone. It is the energy of synergy, of universalizing your purpose so that it benefits the collective. Today, the question is: 'How can I dedicate myself to cooperation?'. Look for ways to share what you have learned, to collaborate with others, and to understand how your personal journey fits into the fabric of the community.
Admin.GalacticTone.Cosmic.interpretation: The Cosmic Tone is the final flight, the one that transcends the current cycle and prepares for the next. It represents pure presence and the ability to endure over time. Having completed the 12-step journey, you can now take your place in the cosmos, present and expanded. It is a day to celebrate your journey, to integrate all that you have learned, and to expand your joy and your love without limits. Today, the question is: 'How do I expand my joy and love?'. Live in the magic of the present moment, knowing that you have completed a cycle and are ready for the next one. It is the energy of homecoming and simultaneous takeoff.

Admin.Stardust.explanationContent:
Stardust is the special currency within AstroVibes. You can use it to unlock premium features, such as sending messages in Psychic Chats.

You can earn Stardust by:
- Leveling up your Cosmic Energy.
- Claiming special rewards (like rating the app).
- Watching ads.
- Purchasing Stardust packs (coming soon).
Admin.CosmicEnergy.explanationContent:
Cosmic Energy (CE) is a measure of your engagement with the app. It's like your experience points!

**What is it for?**
- **Level Up:** Accumulating CE allows you to level up your profile.
- **Unlock Rewards:** Each new level grants you rewards like exclusive avatar frames, profile backgrounds, Stardust, and even free psychic chats.

**How to get it?**
You earn CE automatically by using the app's features, such as:
- Reading your daily, weekly, or monthly horoscopes.
- Getting a tarot card reading.
- Consulting the crystal ball.
- Participating in the community.

DailyTip.subtitle: A dose of cosmic wisdom for your journey.
DailyTip.error: The skies are cloudy. Please try again later.

Aries.title: The Trailblazing Ram
Aries.description: Aries, the first sign of the zodiac, is the trailblazer and pioneer of the astrological wheel. Symbolized by the Ram, they dive headfirst into challenges with a fiery, optimistic spirit that is both inspiring and infectious. Governed by Mars, the planet of action and desire, Aries individuals are born leaders, driven by a powerful ambition and an unwavering belief in their own abilities. They possess a childlike enthusiasm for life and are not afraid to venture into the unknown, making them natural entrepreneurs and innovators. Their energy is cardinal, meaning they initiate action and set things in motion. They thrive on freedom and can become restless if they feel constrained, always looking for the next mountain to climb. This restless energy makes them dynamic but also prone to starting more than they can finish.
Aries.love: In love, an Aries is a passionate, direct, and straightforward partner who approaches romance with the same fervor they apply to all other areas of life. They enjoy the thrill of the chase and are not afraid to make the first move, showering their love interest with attention and grand gestures. They need a partner who can not only match their high energy, but also appreciate their fierce independence and even challenge them. A relationship with an Aries is never dull; it's an adventure filled with spontaneity, but it requires a partner who is confident, independent, and not easily intimidated. They need a relationship that feels like a dynamic partnership, not a restrictive bond.
Aries.friendship: As a friend, Aries is exceptionally loyal, fun-loving, and always ready for the next adventure. They are the friend who will call you at a moment's notice with a wild idea and the one who will defend you fiercely without a second thought. Their friendships are built on action, shared experiences, and mutual encouragement. While their directness can sometimes be blunt, it comes from a place of honesty, and they rarely hold grudges. They will push you to try new things, celebrate your victories as if they were their own, and be the first to lift you up when you fall. They are the motivating force in any friend group.
Aries.work: At work, Aries is a natural leader and a motivated self-starter, thriving in environments that are competitive and fast-paced. They are not afraid to take risks and are excellent at initiating projects, driving them forward with unparalleled enthusiasm. They work best when given the autonomy to take charge and see a project through from start to finish. Their pioneering spirit makes them ideal for roles in entrepreneurship, sales, and any field that rewards bold action and quick decision-making. Their impatience with bureaucracy and slow processes is their main workplace challenge, as they prefer immediate results.

Taurus.title: The Steadfast Bull
Taurus.description: Taurus, the steadfast Bull, is an Earth sign that values security, comfort, and the tangible pleasures of life above all else. Governed by Venus, the planet of love and beauty, Taureans have a deep appreciation for art, music, and all things aesthetically pleasing. They are the builders of the zodiac, known for their reliability, patience, and a down-to-earth nature that provides a grounding force for others. While sometimes perceived as slow, their approach is methodical and deliberate, ensuring that whatever they build is made to last. Their determination is legendary, often bordering on stubbornness, but it is this very quality that makes them so dependable and trustworthy in all aspects of life.
Taurus.love: In a relationship, Taurus is a deeply loyal, devoted, and sensual partner. They express love through physical touch, thoughtful gifts, and creating a comfortable, beautiful home. They seek security and stability, and once they commit, they are in it for the long haul, offering unwavering support. They enjoy the simple, sensory pleasures with their partner, like a gourmet meal, a cozy night in, or a walk in nature. To win their heart, one must demonstrate reliability, patience, and a genuine appreciation for their sensual world. They are not fans of drama and prefer a peaceful, predictable, and deeply rooted partnership.
Taurus.friendship: Taurus friends are the epitome of loyalty and reliability. They are the rock in your life, the friend you can count on to be there, no matter what, with practical advice and a comforting presence. They are patient and great listeners, though their legendary stubbornness can make disagreements a challenge. They love sharing life's pleasures with their friends, from a good meal to a concert, and their homes are often a hub of comfort and hospitality. They may not have a wide circle of friends, but the ones they have are cherished for life and treated as family.
Taurus.work: Professionally, Taurus is methodical, hardworking, and incredibly reliable. They approach tasks with patience and perseverance, ensuring that the job is not just done, but done well. They excel in roles that require a steady hand and a long-term focus, such as finance, real estate, design, or project management. They are excellent managers of money and resources, and their dedication to quality makes them invaluable members of any team. They prefer a stable work environment and are not fond of sudden, unexpected changes, finding comfort in tried-and-true methods.

Gemini.title: The Curious Twins
Gemini.description: Gemini, the chameleon of the zodiac, is an Air sign represented by the celestial Twins. This duality signifies their core nature: they are endlessly curious, masters of communication, and constantly in motion, both mentally and physically. Governed by Mercury, the planet of intellect, they are witty, adaptable, and possess an insatiable thirst for knowledge. They can see all sides of an issue, making them fantastic conversationalists but also prone to indecision. Their energy is mutable, allowing them to adapt to any situation with charm and ease. They are the social butterflies of the zodiac, flitting from one idea, place, or person to the next, always gathering information and sharing it with their extensive network.
Gemini.love: In love, a Gemini needs a partner who is also their intellectual equal and best friend. The relationship must be stimulating, full of witty banter, new experiences, and constant communication. They are flirtatious and charming but can be emotionally detached if they don't feel a mental connection. They need freedom and can feel trapped by a possessive or routine-driven partner. To keep a Gemini engaged, you must keep their mind engaged with new ideas and conversations, as boredom is the greatest threat to their romantic interest. Their love language is words and shared laughter.
Gemini.friendship: Gemini friends are the social butterflies of your circle, always ready with a fascinating story, a clever joke, or the latest news. They have a wide and varied network of acquaintances and love connecting people. A friendship with a Gemini is never boring, but you must be prepared for their sometimes-inconsistent nature and last-minute plan changes. Their loyalty is to fun and intellectual stimulation, and they appreciate friends who understand their need for freedom and a variety of social interactions.
Gemini.work: Professionally, Geminis are masters of communication, marketing, sales, and journalism. They thrive in dynamic, fast-paced environments where they can multitask, learn new skills, and interact with many different people. They get bored easily with repetitive or detail-heavy tasks. Their ability to adapt and think on their feet makes them valuable in roles that require quick thinking and creative problem-solving. They are excellent networkers and team brainstormers, always bringing a fresh perspective.

Cancer.title: The Nurturing Crab
Cancer.description: Cancer, a cardinal Water sign ruled by the Moon, is the ultimate nurturer of the zodiac. Their world is defined by emotion, intuition, and a deep connection with their past and their 'tribe.' Symbolized by the Crab, they possess a hard outer shell to protect their soft, vulnerable interior. Their primary drive is to create security, both for themselves and for those they love. They are deeply tied to the concepts of home and family, whether by blood or by choice. Their memory is legendary, and they hold onto cherished moments and past hurts with equal tenacity, which shapes their present actions and relationships.
Cancer.love: In a relationship, Cancer is a deeply caring, devoted, and committed partner who craves emotional security and a safe, loving home. They express their love through acts of service, nurturing, and fierce protection. They can be incredibly sensitive and their moods can shift like the tides, requiring a patient and empathetic partner who understands their need for reassurance. Once you've earned their trust, they will love you with an unparalleled depth and loyalty, making their partner the center of their universe and creating a sanctuary for your life together.
Cancer.friendship: Cancer friends are like family. They are the 'mom' of the friend group, always ready with a listening ear, a comforting meal, and a safe space to be vulnerable. They are incredibly loyal and empathetic, remembering every important detail of your life. While they can be a bit moody or possessive at times, it comes from a place of deep caring. They will defend their friends with the tenacity of a crab protecting its home and will always be there in times of need, offering both practical and emotional support.
Cancer.work: At work, Cancers are intuitive, responsible, and caring. They thrive in environments where they can nurture and support others, making them excellent in fields like human resources, healthcare, teaching, or childcare. They are loyal employees who value a stable, secure, and family-like work environment. They have a knack for sensing the emotional undercurrents of an office and can be a great source of support for their colleagues, creating a sense of community wherever they go. Their intuition is a powerful asset in decision-making.

Leo.title: The Majestic Lion
Leo.description: Leo, a fixed Fire sign ruled by the magnificent Sun, is the natural-born royalty of the zodiac. Possessing a commanding presence, Leos are charismatic, confident, and have a heart of gold. They are born to lead, to perform, and to inspire others with their radiant warmth and boundless enthusiasm. They see life as a grand stage and are not afraid to take the lead role, believing they are destined for greatness. Their generosity is legendary, and they love to shower their loved ones with affection, attention, and gifts, finding immense joy in the happiness of others. They are fiercely protective of their 'pride' and their principles.
Leo.love: In a relationship, Leo is a passionate, loyal, and incredibly generous partner. They treat love as a grand, romantic performance and need a partner who is willing to be their adoring audience. They require attention, admiration, and affection to feel secure and loved. In return, they offer fierce protection, unwavering loyalty, and a love that is as bright and warm as the sun itself. A relationship with a Leo is a celebration of life, filled with grand gestures, heartfelt declarations, and a lot of fun. They need a partner who can appreciate their flair for the dramatic and share in their joy.
Leo.friendship: As a friend, Leo is the king of the jungle, the center of their social circle. They bring fun, energy, and a touch of drama wherever they go. They are extremely loyal and generous, treating their friends like royalty and defending them fiercely. They love to encourage and motivate their friends, celebrating their successes with genuine joy and pride. A friendship with a Leo is a vibrant and entertaining experience, as long as you're prepared to let them have the spotlight and appreciate their grand nature. They are the friend who makes every outing feel like a special event.
Leo.work: Professionally, Leos are natural leaders who thrive in the spotlight. They are not meant for a cubicle in the back; they need roles that allow for creativity, public recognition, and leadership. They are ambitious, charismatic, and have a flair for the dramatic, making them excellent managers, performers, public speakers, and entrepreneurs. They inspire their teams with their confidence and drive, but they also need to feel appreciated and acknowledged for their significant contributions to feel motivated and perform at their best.

Virgo.title: The Meticulous Maiden
Virgo.description: Virgo, a mutable Earth sign, is the perfectionist and helper of the zodiac. Practical, analytical, and hardworking, Virgos have a deep sense of duty and pay incredible attention to the smallest details. Their methodical approach to life ensures that nothing is left to chance, and they find great satisfaction in being of service to others. Governed by Mercury, they possess a sharp, organized mind and are excellent communicators, though often in a more reserved and thoughtful way than their fellow Mercury-ruled sign, Gemini. They seek to bring order to chaos and to heal what is broken, making them invaluable in any community.
Virgo.love: In love, Virgo expresses affection through acts of service and practical support rather than grand, romantic declarations. They are loyal, devoted partners who seek a deep, intellectual connection and appreciate a well-ordered life. They show they care by helping you fix a problem, organizing your schedule, or offering sound advice. They need a partner who values their dedication, understands that their sometimes-critical nature stems from a genuine desire to improve things, and provides them with a sense of calm, order, and intellectual companionship.
Virgo.friendship: Virgo friends are incredibly reliable and give the best, most practical advice. They are the ones you call when you need help assembling furniture, proofreading an important email, or simply organizing your life. They are loyal, supportive, and grounded, though their tendency to worry can sometimes make them seem anxious. They show their friendship through thoughtful actions and a quiet, steadfast presence rather than loud proclamations. They remember the little things and are always there to lend a practical hand, making them indispensable friends.
Virgo.work: At work, Virgos are the backbone of any successful team. Their analytical minds and meticulous attention to detail make them excellent editors, researchers, data analysts, and project managers. They are efficient, organized, and dedicated to producing high-quality work. They have a talent for spotting flaws and improving systems, making them invaluable in any role that requires precision and a commitment to excellence. They are the ones who ensure everything runs smoothly behind the scenes, often without seeking credit for their crucial work.

Libra.title: The Harmonious Scales
Libra.description: Libra, a cardinal Air sign, is on a perpetual quest for balance, harmony, and justice. Ruled by Venus, the planet of love and beauty, Libras have a deep appreciation for art, intellectual pursuits, and partnership. They are the diplomats of the zodiac, always striving to create fairness and peace in their relationships and environment. They are social creatures who thrive on connection and are happiest when they are in a balanced, harmonious partnership. They weigh every option, which can make them indecisive, but it stems from a genuine desire to make the best possible choice for everyone involved. Their goal is to create beauty and equilibrium in a chaotic world.
Libra.love: In a relationship, Libra seeks a true partnership built on equality, intellectual connection, and mutual respect. They are incredibly romantic, charming, and love to create a beautiful and harmonious life with their partner. They need a partner who is their equal in every way, someone with whom they can share ideas, social events, and a beautifully curated home. Their biggest challenge is their aversion to conflict, which can lead them to suppress their own needs to keep the peace. They thrive with a partner who encourages open and honest communication, even when it's difficult.
Libra.friendship: Libra friends are the social butterflies and peacemakers of their group. They are excellent listeners and mediators, always striving to ensure everyone gets along and feels included. They love socializing, hosting parties, and enjoying cultural activities like visiting museums or attending concerts. Their indecisiveness can be frustrating when trying to make plans, but their charm and genuine desire for harmony make them beloved companions. They are fair-minded and will always hear both sides of a story, making them excellent confidants.
Libra.work: Professionally, Libras excel in roles that require diplomacy, negotiation, and a sense of justice. They make excellent lawyers, mediators, HR managers, and team leaders. They thrive in collaborative environments and are skilled at bringing people together to achieve a common goal. They have a keen eye for aesthetics, which also makes them successful in fields like design, art, and fashion. A harmonious and pleasant work environment is crucial for their productivity and well-being. They are natural networkers.

Scorpio.title: The Enigmatic Scorpion
Scorpio.description: Scorpio, a fixed Water sign, is perhaps the most intense and mysterious sign of the zodiac. Ruled by both Pluto (transformation) and Mars (passion), they operate on a level of emotional depth and power that is often hidden beneath a calm, controlled exterior. They are known for their determination, passion, and unwavering focus. For a Scorpio, life is not meant to be lived on the surface; they seek to uncover the underlying truth in all things, and they are not afraid of the darkness. This gives them a powerful, magnetic, and sometimes intimidating presence. Their perception is their superpower.
Scorpio.love: In love, Scorpio is an 'all or nothing' partner. They seek a profound, soul-deep connection and are incredibly passionate, magnetic, and fiercely loyal. Trust and honesty are paramount; betrayal is the ultimate sin and is rarely forgiven. They can be possessive and jealous, but this stems from a deep fear of vulnerability and a desire for total union. When they commit, they merge with their partner on every level, offering a transformative love that is both powerful and healing, demanding absolute loyalty in return.
Scorpio.friendship: Scorpio friends are fiercely loyal, protective, and will be your secret-keeper for life. They prefer a small circle of deep, authentic friendships over a large crowd of acquaintances. They have a built-in lie detector and value honesty above all. While they may not be the most outwardly expressive, their actions speak volumes, and they will go to the ends of the earth for those they consider family. If you earn a Scorpio's trust, you have a powerful and devoted ally for life who will challenge you to be your best self.
Scorpio.work: Professionally, Scorpios are focused, resourceful, and excellent problem-solvers. They thrive in roles that require investigation, strategy, and uncovering hidden information, such as detectives, surgeons, researchers, or financial analysts. They are determined to succeed and are not afraid of challenges or high-pressure situations. Their ability to see beneath the surface makes them powerful leaders and strategists who can navigate complex office politics with ease. They are masters of crisis management.

Sagittarius.title: The Adventurous Archer
Sagittarius.description: Sagittarius, the final Fire sign, is the eternal optimist, adventurer, and philosopher of the zodiac. Governed by Jupiter, the planet of expansion and luck, their quest for knowledge and truth knows no bounds. They are fueled by a love for freedom, travel, and new experiences. Symbolized by the Archer, they are always aiming their arrows towards a new horizon, both physically and intellectually. Their spirit is infectious, and they inspire others to see the world with wonder and to believe that anything is possible. They cannot stand boredom or feeling constrained.
weaknesses: Will say anything no matter how undiplomatic
Sagittarius.love: In a relationship, Sagittarius needs a partner who is also a co-adventurer. They value freedom, honesty, and intellectual stimulation above all. They are fun-loving, playful, and need plenty of space to roam. A partner who is clingy or possessive will quickly send them running. Their love is expansive and generous, but they fear being tied down. They need a relationship that feels like an open road, not a cage, filled with laughter, shared learning, and a mutual respect for each other's independence.
Sagittarius.friendship: Sagittarius is the friend you call for a last-minute road trip or a deep philosophical debate at 2 AM. They are optimistic, encouraging, and their broad perspective on life can be truly inspiring. Their brutal honesty, while well-intentioned, can sometimes be tactless, but they rarely mean harm and quickly forget conflicts. They are champions of their friends' freedom and will always encourage you to chase your dreams, no matter how big or far-fetched they may seem.
Sagittarius.work: Sagittarius thrives in careers that involve travel, higher education, publishing, and philosophy. They are natural promoters, teachers, and entrepreneurs, always looking for the next big idea or a new frontier to explore. They work best when they are not micromanaged and have the freedom to innovate and learn. Their optimistic outlook can be a huge asset in motivating a team and overcoming obstacles, though they may overlook important details in their rush to the next big thing. They need work with a purpose.

Capricorn.title: The Determined Goat
Capricorn.description: Capricorn, the final Earth sign, represents discipline, ambition, and the long game. Ruled by Saturn, the planet of structure and responsibility, they are the masters of planning and are determined to reach the top of any mountain they set their sights on. They understand that true success is built slowly and deliberately, through hard work and perseverance. They are pragmatic, grounded, and have a deep respect for tradition and legacy. Under their often-serious exterior lies a dry, witty sense of humor and a deep well of loyalty for those they deem worthy.
Capricorn.love: In love, Capricorn is a serious and committed partner who shows affection by building a secure and stable future. They may not be the most outwardly romantic or demonstrative, but their devotion is unwavering. They are looking for a 'power partner,' someone who shares their ambition and values. They are incredibly loyal and will stand by their partner through thick and thin, offering practical support and unwavering reliability. They need a partner who understands that their work and dedication are often their primary expressions of love.
Capricorn.friendship: Capricorn friends are the wise old souls of the group. They are loyal and offer the most practical, no-nonsense advice. They may have a small, tight-knit circle of friends, but their loyalty is for life. They are the friend you call for help with your resume, planning your financial future, or simply to offer a grounded perspective in times of chaos. Their dry, witty sense of humor is a hidden gem that they share with those they trust most. They are steadfast and dependable.
Capricorn.work: Professionally, Capricorns are the ultimate managers, CEOs, and administrators. They are incredibly disciplined, goal-oriented, and have an innate understanding of structure, hierarchy, and long-term strategy. They are destined to be in positions of authority and are willing to put in the hard work to get there. They are masters of delayed gratification, knowing that their efforts will pay off in the end. They lead by example with their tireless work ethic and commitment to quality.

Aquarius.title: The Visionary Water-Bearer
Aquarius.description: Aquarius, a fixed Air sign, is the humanitarian, rebel, and visionary of the zodiac. Ruled by Uranus, the planet of revolution, they are forward-thinking, independent, and intellectual, always striving to make the world a better place. They march to the beat of their own drum and are not afraid to challenge conventions or authority. Their focus is often on the collective, on friendships, and on ideals that can benefit humanity as a whole. They are the inventors and non-conformists of the astrological world, valuing uniqueness and intellectual freedom above all.
Aquarius.love: In love, Aquarius needs a partner who is first and foremost a friend and an intellectual equal. They value communication, shared ideals, and freedom above all else. They can seem emotionally detached, as they tend to rationalize their feelings, but their love is genuine and based on a deep mental connection. They need a partner who understands their need for independence and their sometimes-unconventional approach to relationships. They are not possessive and expect the same freedom in return, valuing a partnership of two whole individuals.
Aquarius.friendship: As friends, Aquarians are loyal, accepting, and will always stand by you. They have a wide and diverse circle of friends and enjoy conversations about social causes, futuristic ideas, and technological innovations. They are the friend who will challenge your thinking, introduce you to new concepts, and accept you for exactly who you are, no matter how strange. Their loyalty is to the group and to their shared ideals, and they make for stimulating and thought-provoking companions who open your mind to new possibilities.
Aquarius.work: At work, Aquarius excels in roles that involve science, technology, social activism, and humanitarian causes. They are innovative team players who bring original ideas to the table. They dislike rigid corporate structures and need the freedom to experiment and work on projects that align with their ideals. They are the visionaries who can see the future and work to bring it into being. They function best in collaborative, forward-thinking environments where their unique perspective is valued.

Pisces.title: The Compassionate Fish
Pisces.description: Pisces, the final Water sign, is the most empathetic, compassionate, and intuitive of the zodiac. Ruled by Neptune, the planet of dreams and illusion, they are deeply connected to the emotional and spiritual realms. They are the mystics, artists, and dreamers, possessing a boundless imagination and a profound understanding of the human condition. Symbolized by two fish swimming in opposite directions, they are constantly navigating between fantasy and reality. They feel everything, which is both their greatest gift and their heaviest burden. Their wisdom is otherworldly.
weaknesses: Can be a victim or a martyr
Pisces.love: In a relationship, Pisces is a hopeless romantic, seeking a magical, soul-deep connection that transcends the mundane. They are incredibly selfless, devoted, and empathetic partners who absorb the emotions of their loved one. They need someone who can protect their sensitive heart, appreciate their dreamy nature, and provide a safe anchor to the real world. Their love is boundless, spiritual, and deeply healing, but they can also be prone to idealizing their partner and overlooking red flags in their quest for a fairytale ending.
Pisces.friendship: Pisces friends are the most compassionate and understanding you'll ever find. They are always there to listen without judgment and offer emotional support. They connect with their friends on a soul level and have an almost psychic ability to sense when something is wrong. They are the friend you go to when you need to feel seen, heard, and accepted unconditionally. Their boundless empathy means they will share in your joys and sorrows as if they were their own, making them truly invaluable companions.
Pisces.work: Pisces thrive in creative and healing professions. They are excellent artists, musicians, therapists, social workers, and healers. They need a work environment that is not high-pressure and that allows them to use their intuition, creativity, and compassion. They are not motivated by money or status, but by the desire to make a difference and to bring more beauty and healing into the world. They may struggle with deadlines and rigid structures, but their imaginative contributions and deep insights are invaluable.
